summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue No. from South line of Coulter's Add to East Thomas Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by laying sewers under Ordinance No. 16855, creating Local Improvement District No. 1580 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
